mapper.insert: insert into user (account_expired, account_locked, avatar, credentials_expired, email, description, enabled, username, nickname, password, phone) values (#{accountExpired}, #{accountLocked}, #{avatar}, #{credentialsExpired}, #{email}, #{description}, #{enabled}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{phone})
mapper.update: update user set account_expired = #{accountExpired}, account_locked = #{accountLocked}, avatar = #{avatar}, credentials_expired = #{credentialsExpired}, email = #{email}, description = #{description}, enabled = #{enabled}, username = #{username}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
